# Welcome!

I am a Ph.D. Student and Research Assistant in Quantitative Marketing at Goethe University. In my free time, I enjoy preparing the next generation for the digital future as a Member of the Board at TechAcademy e.V., a non-profit organization teaching coding and promoting tech literacy.

On this website, you will find information about my Academic [Research](research.qmd) and [Teaching](teaching.qmd), my [Curriculum Vitae](curriculum-vitae.qmd), and my passion project --- [TechAcademy e.V.](curriculum-vitae.qmd)
